channel.title: Abouts on Logan Wright
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Logan Wright

item.description: My name is Logan. I love technology and video games! I’ve always enjoyed tinkering and playing with electronics and learning about tech since I was barely old enough to hold a PlayStation 1 controller. Growing up, I would often help my parents and neighbors with their tech issues or questions (and still do). If I didn’t know an answer to an problem, I would attempt to find it and solve. This path led me to pursue a bachelorâ€™s degree in computer science and a career in IT.
